pr_title: Add TimedCache and use it to cache config values

timeline.message:
Add TimedCache and use it to cache config values

Use it to cache:
 - server.xml app properties
 - raw values retrieved from any source

Config-1.4 caching updates for unit testing

Make TimedCache create an executor when it's used in a unit test

Make ConversionTest wait so that the rawValueCache has time to expire.

The only reason for closing TimedCache is to cancel any pending invalidation task.
